segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just standing there, doing nothing to help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her dishes, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so reckless, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to tip over, and someone’s going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how no one is paying attention to what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet and stop this madness.
segments.speaker: PAR
